titles.title: Lead by Example Act of 2022
Lead by Example Act of 2022
A bill to establish a minimum temperature for thermostats at the headquarters of the Department of Energy and the Environmental Protection Agency, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Lead by Example Act of 2022
This bill requires the Department of Energy and the Environmental Protection Agency to set all thermostats in their respective headquarters to at least 78 degrees Fahrenheit when air conditioning is being used.
